# Supported Boards and OS

Currently we support the following boards and operating systems. This list is subject to continuous updating:

# Supported Boards

# Raspberry Pi

Boards Architecture Machine Var Supported OS
Raspberry Pi Zero ARMv6 arm6 Raspbian
Raspberry Pi Zero W ARMv6 arm6 Raspbian
Raspberry Pi 2 B ARMv7 arm7 Raspbian
Raspberry Pi 3 B ARMv7 (32-bit) arm7 Raspbian
Raspberry Pi 3 A+ ARMv8-AArch64 (64-bit) arm64 Raspbian, SealOS
Raspberry Pi 3 B+ ARMv8-AArch64 (64-bit) arm64 Raspbian, SealOS
Raspberry Pi 4 ARMv8-AArch64 (64-bit) arm64 Raspbian

# BeagleBone

Boards Architecture Machine Var Supported OS
BeagleBone Black ARMv7 arm7 Debian
BeagleBone Green ARMv7 arm7 Debian
BeagleBone Green W ARMv7 arm7 Debian

# Incostartec

Boards Architecture Machine Var Supported OS
pLILLY-A20 ARMv7 arm7 SealOS

# Supported Operating Systems

# Raspbian

Ionoid.io Raspbian are adapted Raspbian images from the Raspberry PI Foundation’s official operating system. The only difference is that we removed the openresolv package because it does not work properly with NetworkManager.

IMPORTANT NOTES

  • Ionoid.io network connectivity works only if NetworkManager is installed
  • Default user and password for Raspbian images are pi and raspberry. Make sure to change it after you successfully login into your Raspbian OS

# Raspbian Ionoid.io Images

  • Raspbian Buster Lite (without desktop) Minimal image based on Debian Buster without desktop (Size 434 MB)
  • Raspbian Buster with desktop Image with desktop based on Debian Buster (Size 1136 MB)
  • Raspbian Buster with desktop and recommended software Image with desktop and recommended software based on Debian Buster (Size 2530 MB)

# SealOS - Secure Linux-IoT

SealOS is a secure Linux-IoT operating system that is distributed to some Ionoid.io partners for now. A more general purpose version will be available for free soon.

To get a SealOS image please contact us at contact@ionoid.io.
